document.full_text: greece should be given time to sort out its finances before talk of any debt restructuring, which would have serious consequences, peter praet, a candidate for the european central bank's executive board said.
document.title: greece must be given time to tackle debt: praet
lines_and_colors: greece should be given time to sort out its finances before talk of any debt restructuring, which would have serious consequences, peter praet, a candidate for the european central bank's executive board said.
